dialogue: Steve! I was worried you wouldn't answer.
I probably shouldn't! What are you calling about?
I was worried you wouldn't answer. I figured calling you was the only way to know for sure.
Quinn, I've told you, only call me if it's urgent.
Well, I answered. Are you satisfied?
Yeah! It's really good to know that you'll answer every time I call.
I'm at work! I can't pick up every single time you call.
Well that's terrifying. I guess I'll have to keep on testing.
I hang up, wondering if this is just Steve's way of keeping me calling. He must get really lonely at work.
